Curology Cream Moisturizer

Brand: Curology

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: WATER, CAPRYLIC/CAPRIC TRIGLYCERIDE, CETEARYL ALCOHOL, CETYL ALCOHOL, ALOE BARBADENSIS LEAF JUICE, SQUALANE, GLYCERIN, DIMETHICONE, HYDROXYETHYL ACRYLATE/SODIUM ACRYLOYLDIMETHYL TAURATE COPOLYMER, LIMNANTHES ALBA (MEADOWFOAM) SEED OIL, BUTYROSPERMUM PA

IL, BUTYROSPERMUM PARKII (SHEA) BUTTER, SODIUM HYALURONATE, CETEARYL OLIVATE, SORBITAN OLIVATE, ARGANIA SPINOSA KERNEL OIL, SODIUM PCA, ALLANTOIN, ISOHEXADECANE, CETEARYL GLUCOSIDE, POLYSORBATE 60, PHENOXYETHANOL, ETHYLHEXYLGLYCERIN, CITRIC ACID, SODIUM HYDROXIDE

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LO
& Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
